title: Storytellin'- Spinning a Trickster Tale
marks: [R Rose-Bear/ \'91\'] on bottom, etched in: R Rose-Bear
description: Scuplture of red stone with large turtle and five smaller turtles with a Cobra-like protrusion in front that has a fox head. (with second place ribbon)
creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund
